snippet: The N.F.L. is exploring with its existing broadcast and cable partners a proposal that would move some games from the NFL Network.
abstract: NFL is exploring proposal under which it would sell six to eight of the 13 Thursday night games it carries on its NFL Network to one of its existing broadcast or cable partners.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. is exploring with its existing broadcast and cable partners a proposal that would move some games from the NFL Network.
